Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: usual problem of being a single traveller I was put in a poor room with a shower but no bath and one of the older rooms Once I complained I was put in one of the newer rooms with a bath But why do you need to complain Saving the better rooms for people that are not single travellers Also I asked for an early morning call when I was leaving and I didn t get it They did remember to order my taxi though

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: A bit more cupboard and some drawers in the room would be good but it is possible as is A bar to hold onto when getting into the bath that is also the shower recess
Positive_Review: Very good location Many places within walking distance and metro station St Placide just outside The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful taking time to help us with any questions order taxis give us directions etc I will definitely use this hotel as my base in Paris every time I visit And it was nice having a kettle and tea making facilities in the room The bed was very comfortable the room was quiet a good size and clean

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: Breakfast was good but too expensive for what is offered I would feel more comfortable if bathroom had a proper door instead of sliding glass door Overall there is no enough light in the room but this is not really something not to like it s more of a personal appeal
Positive_Review: Overall experience was excellent Staff is very kind and helpful hotel is clean location is excellent very near to most touristic locations WIFI was perfect Although the hotel is in a noisy area sound isolation is good and when windows are closed the noise level is not disturbing This is my second stay in this hotel and I had a superior room this time Compared to standard room I had previously superior room has just enough space for comfortable movement around the room

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: The rooms are very small as well as throughout Paris Two people in one room must be well organized to avoid colliding
Positive_Review: Location is great A few steps to the metro station If you arrive from the CDG airport you only need one easy transfer to the hotel metro station RER B rail and metro line 4 Within a 15 minute walk from hotel you will find several very beautiful tourist facilities The breakfast was delicious Very good quality food Excellent juice croissant jam Very helpful staff The hotel is well maintained The cleanliness of the hotel is very good The street where the hotel is located is very quiet and provides a good night s sleep Around the hotel there are several good restaurants and cafes if you do not want to go too far

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location is very good the metro is very close just a few meters away We were on the first floor on our first night which was not a very good room It was a bit noisy from the sounds on the streets and there was some noise in the room probably from the AC or something We moved to the 6th floor the next day which is much better more quiet without the noise The staff was nice The breakfast was very good plenty of choices I would stay here again should I go back to Paris

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: Nothing

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This property was amazing So central and staff were fabulous My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights and would definitely come back A 1 minute walk to Saint Placide metro lots of shops restaurants etc around Free wifi was great too as was the breakfast Huge bed which was so comfy and very clean and spacious We stayed in room 216 which I think was the executive or deluxe and was 100 worth paying the little bit extra for it There was also robes and slippers in the room for us Would recommend to anyone coming to Paris we had a lovely stay

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: Nothing

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: The bathroom shower screen was not properly sealed If you use overhead shower the water will be spilled all over the floor We had to upgrade to superior room from deluxe room which we booked for a non refundable package deal The reason was that the hotel couldn t accommodate 3 persons 2 adults 1 child in a deluxe room The notification just came few days before our departure to Paris Earlier communication would be much appreciated
Positive_Review: The staffs were friendly and helpful Free car park for the guests they even gave us extended parking time until afternoon The breakfast was varied and tasteful The hotel is located nicely near metro station with plenty of restaurants nearby plus it is situation in convenient and quiet neighbourhood but yet still not far from tourist attractions

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: Staff not helpful let others staff and guest interrupt when I was at front desk speaking to staff when asked for places to eat near hotel only directed to mall no map ever given or offered holiday decor didn t fit at all had to go downstairs to borrow wine opener and then take back downstairs hotel only had one Room 308 Shower drain slow didn t work stood in 4 5 inches of dirty water whole time showering Told front desk room change not offered Repair not available on weekend and when Monday came problem not fixed shower water had one temperature scalding hot mold in bathroom caulking see photo molded ceiling in room see photo cleaning was sub par as dirt dust still seen on floors carpet Cristine was suppose to have arranged for complementary breakfast for us due to issues she did not Chloetelly sp in breakfast room was very rude about it No wait staff came to acknowledge us There s more but too frustrated to write First time in Europe First time in Paris Not a good impression Holiday Inn Can t believe a Holiday Inn would have such a place
Positive_Review: Comfort of bed Close to metro

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: 1 The room and bed were extremely small for us We are a family of 2 adults and a 3 year old baby and couldn t all fit on the queen size bed As for our baby stroller we couldn t fit it in the room even when it was folded and had to leave it outside the room at all times 2 The breakfast was a continental breakfast and not an american style breakfast thus the varities were very limited to pastries cornflakes and some cheese
Positive_Review: 1 The hotel is located right next to the Saint Placid metro station just about 1 min away from the station entrance Its also located right in the center of Paris enabling you to visit all the attractions by just walking around and you don t even need to take the metro Its on one of the busiest shopping streets of Paris filled with shops resturaunts and supermarkets 2 The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful and they even ordered us some delievery food on our first day of arrival as we arrived a bit late 23 00 and the hotel kitchen and roomservice were already closed

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: I recieved a twin bed in my room although booked a queen bed room When I checked in late at night they started to say that they are not obliged to provide queen bed and only after they rechecked the booking they admitted that there was a mistake They could not have upgrade since the hotel was fully booked according to them I guess that that just sold my room twice thinking there will be a no show This is not appropriate for a holiday inn hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel location is great The free wifi is pretty good breakfast is fairly good

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: We had to leave early and had paid for breakfast in advance so they wanted to charge 7E for us to request a takeaway coffee and croissant This was extremely disappointing as they should have honoured this in good faith for nothing Forfeiting a full breakfast already paid in return for a croissant and coffee takeaway at 6am surely is no hardship and they win regardless so not even doing this for no charge let alone an additional charge this let the hotel down in my opinion and I m in the hotel industry

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s

Negative_Review: Only thing was that the housekeeping staff did not replenish the small milk capsules after we used the first 2

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: Small room but that s Paris I guess And we had a baby cot which left us with little room to move around The bathroom design could be improved Water was leaking from the basin and the bath tub If we weren t careful enough the whole bathroom could end up flooding and there was no barrier between the bathroom and bedroom Water could easily flow out of the bathroom

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: Windows lack a joint the noice isolation is very poor some cars or trucks seems to be in the room

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: There was no slippers in the room
Positive_Review: Nice facilities Good location Breakfast was nice also Luisa the receptionist was very sweet and helpful Thanks Luisa

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
Negative_Review: When we arrived in the hotel nobody greeted us After we got our room card nobody offered to help us with our bags instead we had to find a trolley ourselves The rooms are dated pink purple themed throughout very small requested in advance for a room in the upper levels with a better view received room on first floor without view instead TV was positioned diagonally to the bed had to turn to see anything very uncomfortable Room was so small we hardly had room to walk around the bed Even the ceilings are low The bathrooms were old with stains and dirty corners around bathtub Glass sliding door for the bathroom which makes a loud noise and bangs when you close or open Noise from bathroom transfers to bedroom not romantic at all The worst part the food DO NOT INCLUDE BREAKFAST It is the worst breakfast i have ever had in any hotel We couldn t eat any of it and were stuck with it for 4 days It looks like food but tastes like garbage Fruits are from a can meat is deep fried extremely oily juice is sugar water pancakes are sickly sweet coffee is a nespresso machine without milk frother ie only espresso real lattes etc cost extra croissants are worse than the frozen variety you get in a supermarket and the worst part is every day you have exactly the same limited buffet World s cheapest smallest buffet Much nicer to eat in a cafe in paris and less expensive Overall wouldn t recommend staying there with the prices they are charging Should be downgraded to 3 star
Positive_Review: Easy to get to subway station That s about it really

Hotel_Name: Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pr s
